entry.title: About Me
entry.content:
Personal Information

  • Name: Xinyu Mao
  • Mobile: +31 687781028
  • Email: x.mao@uu.nl
  • Address: Utrecht, Netherlands

Profile

  • Master’s student in Business Informatics with a specialization in business administration and information technology analysis, project management, and production operation management.
  • Practical experience includes 4 months of Business Operation Internship and over 2 years of work experience as a product manager.
  • Seeking a job relevant to business analysis, project/program management, and customer requirements analysis in early 2024.

Work Experience

Business Operation Intern, NIO Inc., Amsterdam

  • Dates: 07/2023 - Present
  • Coordinated customer interactions for process improvement, enhancing VOC data collection and issue resolution efficiency.
  • Monitored and reported the operations of the Power Charging system, tracking charging-related issues and generating Business Requirement Documents (BRDs) for functional upgrades.
  • Aligned with various teams to ensure operational efficiency.

Product Manager, Tongcheng Travel Holdings Limited, Nanjing, China

  • Dates: 05/2020 - 01/2022
  • Conducted business opportunity and risk analysis, resulting in a 25% increase in revenue.
  • Managed product marketing programs, optimizing the online user conversion rate.
  • Analyzed data and generated KPI reports focusing on ticket volume, revenue, and conversion rate.
  • Performed data visualization for business value analysis.

Project Experience

Hospi+) - Science-based entrepreneurship project, Team Leader

  • Dates: 02/2023 - 04/2023
  • Led a team to design a recovery app that reminds patients to take medication, recommends recovery exercises, and provides nutrition advice.

Business Processing Intelligence Challenge, Team Leader

  • Dates: 04/2022 - 07/2022
  • Analyzed business value and opportunities for the Service Desk based on Rabobank data.
  • Utilized Arena to simulate event processing and determine the optimal number of service desks.
  • Defined an optimal solution based on simulation results and business value analysis.

Task-driven Growth Platform for College Students, Project Manager

  • Dates: 12/2018 - 12/2021
  • Responsible for product functional design, prototype drawing, content analysis, and project planning.
  • Generated product business analysis reports based on competitive products.

Education

  • Master of Business Informatics

    • Utrecht University, Graduate School of Natural Sciences
    • Dates: 02/2022 - Present (Thesis pending)

  • Bachelor of Information Management and Information Systems

    • Central China Normal University, School of Information Management
    • Dates: 09/2017 - 06/2021

Awards

  • Individual Academic Scholarship (2020)
  • Third Prize in China National College Student “Innovation, Originality and Entrepreneurship” Challenge, CCNU (2019 & 2020)
  • Overseas Exchange Scholarship (2018 & 2019)
  • Bronze Prize in the 2020 National Undergraduate Business Plan Competition, CCNU (2019)
  • Provincial Silver Prize in the 5th Internet+ Innovation and Entrepreneurship Contest for College Students (2019)

Skills

  • Language Skills: Chinese (Native), English (Full professional proficiency)
  • Computer Skills: Figma, Jira, SQL, Python, Excel, PowerPoint, Word, etc.
  • Soft Skills: Effective communication, stakeholder management, problem-solving.
